effect.en: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
effect.fr: Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts à chaque Pokémon de votre adversaire. (N’appliquez ni la Faiblesse ni la Résistance aux Pokémon du Banc.)

description.en: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
